TITLE: Backup Email - FastComments
HEADING: Backup Email
DESCRIPTION: If you lose access to your primary email, your backup email can be used to recover your account.
BACKUP_EMAIL_PENDING_VERIFICATION: This backup email is pending verification.
BACKUP_EMAIL_VERIFIED_SUCCESS: Success! Your backup email has been verified.
VERIFICATION_EMAIL_SENT: Verification email sent! Check your inbox at <%- user.pendingBackupEmail %> for a link to complete the process.
ERROR_BACKUP_EMAIL_SAME_AS_PRIMARY: Backup email cannot be the same as your primary email.
ERROR_BACKUP_EMAIL_TAKEN: That email is already in use.
ERROR_BACKUP_EMAIL_INVALID: The email address [email] is not valid.
ERROR_RATE_LIMITED_MINUTE: You have exceeded our rate limits. Please try again in a few minutes or reach out to support.
ERROR_RATE_LIMITED_DAY: You have exceeded our daily rate limits. Please try again in 24 hours or reach out to support.
